body:
I made sure i checked it and i have particle effects on but whenever i die or the map changes it dissapears.
It seems to only happen to me though. ;n;
body_tagged:

title: Trails not working

replies.body: Trails are not meant to appear when you are playing, it's a glitch. Once you die, it disappears, which is what it is supposed to be.
replies.body_tagged: Trails are not meant to appear when you are playing, it's a glitch. Once you die, it disappears, which is what it is supposed to be.

replies.body: but, posidigun and borra_ (taking for example) has their trail all the time, borra_ even has his/her heart particles in Tynvale's 3rd top 5 list
replies.body_tagged: but, posidigun and borra_ (taking for example) has their trail all the time, borra_ even has his/her heart particles in Tynvale's 3rd top 5 list

replies.body: If you don't die, it will stay there.
replies.body_tagged: If you don't die, it will stay there.
